originalText.text: Our family is very grateful to Dr Grinberg and his team for the amazing outcome for our grandmother after her surgery!!! Would recommend him to anyone without a hesitation.

text.text: Our family is very grateful to Dr Grinberg and his team for the amazing outcome for our grandmother after her surgery!!! Would recommend him to anyone without a hesitation.

originalText.text: Dr. Grinberg and his staff are truly the best. He has performed surgery on my dad and myself. He is a great professional, very caring and very detailed oriented. He treats his patients as family and his sense of humor is unbelievable and unbeatable! He has a big heart, he's kind, and makes you feel safe. Always available when i need him with concerns before and after surgery. God bless him, his hands, family and staff. Best doctor in the WORLD. THANK YOU DR GRINBERG .

text.text: Dr. Grinberg and his staff are truly the best. He has performed surgery on my dad and myself. He is a great professional, very caring and very detailed oriented. He treats his patients as family and his sense of humor is unbelievable and unbeatable! He has a big heart, he's kind, and makes you feel safe. Always available when i need him with concerns before and after surgery. God bless him, his hands, family and staff. Best doctor in the WORLD. THANK YOU DR GRINBERG .

originalText.text: I had a surgery by Dr. Grinberg, and he was both professional and clear and concise in his explanation pre- and post-operation. I was able to explain my personal concerns and situations and received constructive feedback and recommendations. Specifically, a few days after the surgery, on a Sunday, I was concerned about some pain. I called into Dr. Grinbergâ€™s office and was given comforting advice by a fellow. Dr. Grinberg followed up with a call a few minutes after, and explained what I was experiencing is normal. Definitely eased any concerns that I had.

originalText.text: Absolutely fantastic care and recovery. Dr Grinberg was amazing from the beginning. I had not been in hospital for many years, and his expertise and confidence brought huge reassurance and comfort. Highly recommended.

text.text: Absolutely fantastic care and recovery. Dr Grinberg was amazing from the beginning. I had not been in hospital for many years, and his expertise and confidence brought huge reassurance and comfort. Highly recommended.
